title: Famous Grouse
author: Famous Grouse
content: invest with money you can afford to lose and manage Risk well with less you can afford to lose which is the supposed right words to use in the financial market?

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 09:10:39 AM invest with money you can afford to lose and manage Risk well with less you can afford to lose which is the supposed right words to use in the financial market? Yes, that's right.And a better approach is, to invest only in those assets that you know and don't do random investments that has becoming a trend during the bull run.Even if you've got no idea about the asset you'll be investing and crypto to be specific, you'll still invest. That's a wrong approach and it's proven to make more people broke with that market strategy.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 09:10:39 AM invest with money you can afford to lose and manage Risk well with less you can afford to lose which is the supposed right words to use in the financial market? You should put the  Quoteinvest with money you can afford to lose first and after that Quotemanage Risk well with less you can afford to lose   after you invest with money that you can afford to lose, you have to manage your risk so you cannot lose, because of the uncertainty of the market and of the projects these words are coined so you will not come out very disappointed, the market is very volatile if you don't follow these two advices you will end up disappointed.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 07, 2022, 09:10:39 AM invest with money you can afford to lose and manage Risk well with less you can afford to lose which is the supposed right words to use in the financial market? I always use the word only invest what you can afford to lose, in fact, its one of my mantras on investing and gambling, it's hard to manage your risk when you want to make a profit from the coins/token that you've invested so for your peace of mind only invest what you can afford to lose is the right word that you should adopt, always remember the market is very volatile so you should refrain from chasing your losses, and you will not do that if you only invest what you can afford to lose.

comments.body: if you are talking about investing in the altcoin market, you can use your first sentence. because that is exactly what many investors in the crypto market do and say.invest with money that you are prepared to lose. do not involve other people to bear the risk of the investment you make. such as borrowing additional money to invest, or selling valuable assets to increase investment assets. just do it slowly with our ability. will slowly grow.
